22194.「ふう。ようやく 着いたね。\n ……さて 聖獣ダイキリンさまは\n どこらへん:
Phew. We're finally here. Now, where do you
think the Holy Beast Dai Kirin is?

22196.<if_woman>「いい？ <cs_pchero>ちゃん。\n 聖獣ダイキリン:
Are you ready? <cs_pchero>. Holy Beast Dai
Kirin's weakness is Zam. Use Zam spells and
you'll be at a great advantage!

22197.<if_woman>「来たわっ！ お願いね！ <cs_pchero>ちゃん！\n:
Here it comes! Please! <cs_pchero>! Be
merciless and bring down Dai Kirin!

22198.「さあ 着いたわ。\n 今度こそ 聖獣ダイキリンさまを倒して\n あなたの強さを:
Here we are. This time, I want you to defeat
the Holy Beast Dai Kirin and show me how
strong you are!

22199.<if_woman>「いい？ <cs_pchero>ちゃん。\n 聖獣ダイキリン:
Are you ready? <cs_pchero>. Holy Beast Dai
Kirin's weakness is Zam. Use Zam spells and
you'll be at a great advantage!

22200.<if_woman>「来たわっ！ お願いね！ <cs_pchero>ちゃん！\n:
Here it comes! Please! <cs_pchero>! Be
merciless and bring down Dai Kirin!

22201.「ふおーーーっ！ ふぉっふぉっふぉーっ！\n 参ったーっ！ わしの負けじゃあーっ: Whoo-hoo-hoo! Whoo-hoo-hoo! Oh, no! I've lost!

22202.「いやはや お前さん 強いのう～。\n 本気を出した わしに勝つとは\n たいし:
Well, you're strong. You're a great guy to
beat me in a real fight.

22203.「して こんな所へ わざわざ来るとは\n わしに 聞きたいことでもあるんかあ？\:
So, is there something you want to ask me,
coming all the way here? Hmm?

22204.「は…はじめまして ダイキリンさまっ！\n 私 賢者のアーニアといいまして……\:
How do you do, Mr. Dai Kirin? My name is Anya
the Sage and I'm the one who wants to talk to
you!

22205.「なぬ？ 用があるのは 嬢ちゃんのほうか。\n ふ～む。お前さんみたいなのが い:
What? You're the one who wants to see me,
aren't you? Hmmm. What in the world does
someone like you want to ask me?

22206.「えーと…… 私 大賢者になりたくて\n ダイキリンさまの お話を聞きたかったん:
Well... I wanted to become a great sage, so I wanted to hear a story from you, Daikirin- sama. So I was wondering if you could teach me
some old spells or...

22207.「んん～っ！？ いやっ 待て 待て～！\n 嬢ちゃんが 大賢者になる？\n 確か:
Nn~! No, wait, wait~! You're going to become
the Great Sage? Are you sure that's what he
said?

22208.「え？ は…はい。\n 大賢者になるのが 小さいころからの夢で\n 幼なじみとも:
Huh? Yes. I've dreamed of becoming a great
sage since I was a little girl, and I promised
my childhood friend to do it.

22210.「ぶおーっ！ ふぉふぉふぉふぉ！\n ぶふぉふぉふぉふぉ！ こりゃ ケッサク！\:
Boo-hoo! Buh-buh-buh! Buh-buh-buh! Oh, kessak!
You're the Great Sage!

22212.「ぶはぁ～。いやあ すまん。すまんのう。\n 嬢ちゃん いいかあ よ～く聞けよぉ:
Bwah~. Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Miss, listen
to me, okay?

22213.「お前さんには 心の闇が いっさい見えん！: I don't see any darkness in your heart!

22214.「心を持つ者ならば 皆 大なり小なり\n 闇を抱えて 生きるのが 道理じゃが……:
It's only logical that everyone with a heart lives with either a little or a lot of darkness inside.
But for some reason, you don't seem to have any.

22215.「宇宙の理。その深遠に横たわるのが 闇じゃ。\n その闇を知らずに 賢者として\:
The reason of the universe. Lying in the depths is darkness. It is absurd to think that you can become a great sage without knowing
the darkness.

22216.<if_woman>「そこの 娘っ子なら ともかく\n 嬢ちゃんは 天地が ひっ:
<if_woman>I don't care if it's your daughter over there,
she's not going to turn into a great sage even
if heaven and earth were turned upside down.<else>I don't care if it's your son over there, he's
not going to turn into a great sage even if
heaven and earth were turned upside down.<endif>

22217.「……これ以上 話すのは 無駄なようじゃのう。\n それでは わしは 失礼させて:
It seems that there is no point in talking any
more. Now, if you'll excuse me, I must be off.

22218.「そんな……。私は 大賢者になれない……？\n シェリルも このことを知っていて:
Oh, no... I can't be the Great Sage? Did
Cheryl know about this and told me to give it
up?

22219.「私 夢を かなえるために\n 今まで がんばってきたのに……。\n こんな……:
I've worked so hard all my life to make my
dreams come true, but this... this can't be...

22220.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん…… ごめん。\n 私 どうし:
<cs_pchero>... sorry. I don't know what to
do... shall we go back to the Royal Academy
for now?

22221.「きっと シェリルも\n このことを 知ってたんだね……。\n だから 井戸で会:
I'm sure Cheryl knew about this too... that's
why she did what she did when we met at the
well...

22222.「アーニア。お前に 手紙が届いたぞ。: Anya. I got a letter for you.

22224.「シェリルから手紙？ なんだろう……？\n 読んでみますね。:
A letter from Cheryl? What is it...? I'll read
it.

22225.「……親愛なる友 アーニア。\n この間は ひどいことを言って すまなかった。\:
My dear friend Anya. I'm sorry for the
terrible things I said to you the other day. I
couldn't help myself if I didn't.

22226.「アーニア……。今から ３年ほど前\n 賢者になる試験の直前に お前が かかった:
Anya... do you remember the terrible illness
you had about three years ago, just before
your examination to become a sage?

22227.「あれは 病気などではない……。\n 賢者を志す者の心の闇に取り憑く\n 呪いだ:
It wasn't a disease... It was a curse that
haunts the darkest hearts of those who
aspire to be sages!

22228.「あのまま放っておけば 呪いのチカラにより\n お前の心は 完全に闇に支配された:
If left unchecked, the power of the curse
would have completely taken over your heart.

22229.「ひとたび そうなってしまえば\n 心を乗っとられ 二度と\n 自分の心を 取り:
Once that happens, it takes over your mind and
you can never get it back.

22230.「……私は お前を救いたい 一心で\n お前の中に眠る 心の闇を 奪いとり\n:
I have taken the darkness that lies dormant
within your heart and assumed its curse with
the sole intention of saving you...

22231.「その時点で お前と私の 夢は断たれた……。\n お前は 大賢者に必要な闇のチカ:
At that point, the dreams of you and I were severed... You lost the dark power necessary to become the Great Sage, and I was doomed to
destruction by the curse.

22232.「……これが 真実だ。\n お前に これだけは 伝えたかった。: This is the truth. I wanted to tell you this.

22233.「私は 呪いもろとも この世を去る。\n ……だが アーニア。お前だけは 生きて:
I will leave this world, curse and all. But
Anya. I want you to live. That is my last
wish...

22234.「シェリル……。そんな…そんな………！\n あのコが おかしくなってしまったのは:
Cheryl... Oh, no... no...! Was it all my fault
that she went crazy?

22235.「私の 呪われた心の闇を\n 奪ったために……。:
For taking away my accursed heart of
darkness...

22236.「……ダメ。このまま シェリルを\n 放っておくことなんて できない。: No. I can't leave Cheryl like this.

22237.「大賢者になんて なれなくていい！\n 私は 絶対に シェリルを救う方法を\n:
I don't have to be the Great Sage! I will find
a way to save Cheryl.

22238.<if_woman>「ねえ <pc>ちゃん。\n しばらくしたら また 私に\n:
Hey <pc>. Would you be willing to
help me again in a little while?

28417.<if_woman>「私 死に物狂いで がんばるから！\n 準備ができたら 賢者:
I'll do my very best! When you're ready, I
want you to come to me as a
sage. Please
<pc>!
